NewsArticle.Title: Kruna Bonus Reminder
NewsArticle.Content:
Kruna coupons purchased on the month of July and used before August 1st will receive an additional 50% bonus. You have less than 1 week left to take advantage of this offer. Time is running out, stock up now!
$10 Kruna Coupon = 1500 Kruna $30 Kruna Coupon = 5000 Kruna
**This offer will not be repeated again this year.**
